@1shankarsharma Completely agree.  Went a few months ago and still think about the Chicken Ghee Roast w/ Neer Dosa.

Literally meaning ‘water dosa’ in the Tulu language, the Neer Dosa is a sofy, airy rice paper crepe. Pair this with just about any gravy for a true South Indian experience!
